name: Rotten Dinner
description: It's such a beautiful evening. Won't you share it with me over a lovely dinner? What is the main course, my sweetheart? Oh, it's a secret...  Warning: The game contains gory/surrealistic scenes, unpleasant sounds, etc., if you are sensitive to such content, then please refrain from playing!  ♡ Do not endanger your health ♡ This is a demo version containing three routes, the game is not intended for persons under 18+ years! POSSIBLY the erotic route will be added to the full version (if I'm strong enough to do so...) Feedback is very important for me! This is my first game, which was my introduction to completely unfamiliar programs, so please criticize me gently (also, English is not my first language, so excuse my shitty sentences)
